Text:
This is the French film Indigenes from last year.
WW2 film about French Arabs fighting Nazis.
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0444182/

I downloaded this & the sound is shocking...
No bass. Just top end treble only. Grates on the ear.

Picture 9/10
Sound 2/10

get 1Cd subs at opensubtitles. they match.
